_comment: Pterodactyl Egg for JavaScript Minecraft Clone Server
name: JavaScript Minecraft Clone
author: olaf-klein@github.com
description: A JavaScript Minecraft clone with desktop client and dedicated server support, compatible with Pterodactyl panel.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash
# JavaScript Minecraft Clone Server Installation

# Install dependencies
npm install

# Build the server
npm run build

# Create logs directory
mkdir -p logs

echo "Installation completed successfully!"

variables.name: Server Name
variables.description: The name of your Minecraft server

variables.name: Max Players
variables.description: Maximum number of players allowed on the server

variables.name: World Seed
variables.description: Seed for world generation (leave empty for random)
